attributes.action: publicly condemn the brutal sentencing of a Saudi rape victim to corporal punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister must state in the plainest terms that our country will not treat with regimes that completely disregard the International Convention on Human Rights by hiding behind excuses of religion or social culture

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
